name: 数论基础
complexity: O(1) for basic operations, O(log min(a,b)) for gcd, O(sqrt(n)) for prime factorization
scenarios: Modular arithmetic, divisibility, prime numbers, greatest common divisor, least common multiple, congruence, residue systems, number-theoretic functions
extensions: Euclidean algorithm, extended Euclidean algorithm, modular inverse, Chinese remainder theorem, Euler's theorem, Fermat's little theorem, linear Diophantine equations
